content.html: Amy Schumer reveals one Oscars joke she wasn’t allowed to say — “Don’t Look Up is the name of a movie? More like don’t look down the barrel of Alec Baldwin’s shotgun” “I wasn’t allowed to say any of that, but you can just come up & [slap] someone” (via: variety.com/2022/film/news…)
content.value:
Amy Schumer reveals one Oscars joke she wasn’t allowed to say — “Don’t Look Up is the name of a movie? More like don’t look down the barrel of Alec Baldwin’s shotgun”

“I wasn’t allowed to say any of that, but you can just come up & [slap] someone”

(via: variety.com/2022/film/news…)

content.html: Imagine writing a joke this horrible, getting saved by everyone saying “we will not let you tell this awful awful joke,” then being like “fine! I’ll leak it myself!” Just God-level self sabotage twitter.com/discussingfilm…
content.value: Imagine writing a joke this horrible, getting saved by everyone saying “we will not let you tell this awful awful joke,” then being like “fine! I’ll leak it myself!” Just God-level self sabotage
